celeb

2001-10-31

I went to PTA after class & started work on my costume, a huge feathery bedsheet hooded suit that fits over my stilts, + extended arms (last minute addition) ... went up to Franklin St. where there were throngs of people, belligerent drunk assholes and otherwise. Was shoved down in a crowd, the girl came back & said she was pushed, not true but I don't care. Tons of people got pictures with me, but I have yet to see the full effect.

Can see the height aspect here:
